price: -Sε Yεbεsesa mo tebea yi abͻ mo akͻ (tebea foforͻ) a mo nnim mu.
arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمۡثَٰلَكُمۡ وَنُنشِئَكُمۡ فِي مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ʿalā an nubaddila amthālakum wanunshi-akum fī mā lā taʿlamūna
